page.title: 16Education
page.content: There are three{schools}in Tadcaster. Two of them are Junior Schools with an Infant Department and the third is the Comprehensive School called Tadcaster Grammar School which is just outside the town at Toulston. It is a big school and offers a good{education.}A{ {uniform}is worn which is black, blue and white, the girls wearing black or blue skirts and the boys blue or grey trousers with white or blue shirts. Most children do not like wearing uniform but I think it is a good idea as some children might wear outrageous clothes and hairstyles. Also in Tadcaster is an{Adult Education}Centre which teaches typing, sewing, lacemaking, cooking and woodwork.
